bug.question: I have spots and I fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round dots on my wings!
🌸 I like to land on flowers!
🪰 I am an insect!

bug.question: I make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 My honey is sweet.
🐝 I fly around buzzing.
🌷 I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I wiggle in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I'm long and skinny.
🌧️ I like to come out when it rains.
🌱 I help the plants grow.

bug.question: I jump really high! Who am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am usually green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌿 I like to live in grassy areas.

bug.question: I march in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself.
🏘️ I live in a colony.

bug.question: I spin a web. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I use my web to catch food.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 My web is like my home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and become something beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I have colorful wings when I grow up.
🦋 I go in a chrysalis.

bug.question: I light up at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have a light on my bottom.
🌃 You can see me in the dark.
🐞 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer. Who am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love hot weather.
🎶 Only the boys make the sound.
🌳 I live in trees.

bug.question: I eat wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can damage houses made of wood!
🐜 I live in colonies underground.
🏠 I have a king and queen in my home.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and have big teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I like to eat fish.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🦈 People are sometimes scared of me.

ocean.question: I am a home for fish, and I am very colorful. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Little fish like to hide in me.
🌈 I have many different colors.
🪨 I am made of many small animals.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and cover most of the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Many creatures live in me.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🌍 I am made of water.

ocean.question: I am a little house that some sea creatures carry around. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am hard.
🏖️ You can find me on the beach.
🐚 A crab sometimes lives inside me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide among the rocks.
👐 My arms help me grab things.

ocean.question: I am a very big whale that sings songs. What kind of whale am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very large.
🎶 People can hear my songs from far away.
🌊 I eat tiny creatures called krill.

ocean.question: I am flat, swim in the sea, and have a long tail that stings! What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I move like a ribbon in the water.
🏖️ Be careful where you step in shallow water.
🐡 I am not a fish.

ocean.question: I’m a sea animal that looks like a star. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐️ I have arms like a star
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean
🖐 Some people call me a sea star

ocean.question: I'm a bird that loves to swim and catch fish in the ocean. I waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I live in cold places, too!
❄️ I have black and white feathers
🚫 I cannot fly

ocean.question: I am very tiny and drift in the ocean. Many animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am like a plant.
🔬 You need a microscope to see me well.
🐋 Whales love to eat me.
